lender.name: Christian & Stéphanie
lender.loan_because: Yes, we can ! And it's beautiful !

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: I believe it will make a difference!

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: Because I want to help ensure that everyone on Earth has a fair chance at living a great life, and so that we can all work together towards a sustainable future.
lender.occupational_info: I guide ecotours in a 10 000 year old rainforest in British Columbia, and I educate our guests about the environment and sustainability in between zipping some extremely long and fast ziplines! My work is exhilarating! During the tour I teach our guests about the ecosystem of the Coastal Temperate Rainforest. As well as how it relates to the balance and cycles of mother nature, natural sustainability, along with the principals of The Natural Step.

lender.name: Josh
lender.occupational_info: I make sure banks and business protect their computer data.

lender.name: Serena
lender.loan_because: Human potential is a resource that should not be wasted.
lender.occupational_info: I help people live in joyful response to the love of God that has been given to them.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to help the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I build software tools for businesses.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it is efficient and inspiring.
lender.occupational_info: Publishing media for business people. Making individuals in a profession or an industry into a community.

lender.name: DailyClarity
lender.loan_because: I can and so therefore I must
lender.occupational_info: Corporate and reporter - two sides of one person

lender.name: Lina
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: Someone believed in me and gave me a loan for my small business and now I am passing the blessing on and watching it multiply!
lender.occupational_info: I capture special events in people's lives with my video camera. I'm praying that soon I can use my camera to help make a difference in lives all over the world!

lender.name: Yumi
lender.loan_because: I believe we all have a responsibility to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles about how to make yourself and the world a better place. I also share articles about improving the world with other people.

lender.name: Mel and Jess
lender.loan_because: I think its important to give people the power to change their own lives.

lender.name: Jonathon
lender.loan_because: As a quirk of fate, I live a privileged life. I'd like to take some of this privilege and spread it around. Kiva is very appealing because you have a chance to get involved with someone who is trying to get something going, and lend a helping hand. Its not a handout, it's a helpout.

lender.name: Thelma
lender.loan_because: I have always thought it was important to give back. Sadly, it has not been as big a part of my life as I think it should be. I hope to start putting an end to that by being a part of what Kiva is doing. That I can share my resources to help someone is great. To see that money recycled to help even more people is phenomenal!

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me a gift certificate for Mother's Day. I think that it is a great way to empower people!
lender.occupational_info: I teach children who are blind or have very poor vision and are unable to see the print in their books

lender.name: Marjorie
lender.loan_because: To be able to lend a helping hand to people who need it is very rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I put books and magazines through a scanner when merchants return boxes of surplus product. We send most magazines to a large paper shredder to be recycled but most of our books go back on our storage shelves to be shipped out in other orders. I work with a lot of people from other countries and it's a cheerful place to be employed.

lender.name: Margie Gacioch
lender.loan_because: I would like to see these people succeed. We have so much in our lives I would like to share what I have.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I think it's pretty amazing that Kiva has created a way to provide direct assistance to MFI's funding of people in their community, who otherwise would have little access to capital, in support of their efforts to improve quality of life.

lender.name: Truck
lender.loan_because: I promote capitalism.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea of people trying to make a better life for themselves thru their own hard work.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: when you can help you should help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in university studying to become a teacher. I would like to teach young adults about Politics and global issues.

lender.name: Arizona-Rick
lender.loan_because:
1. Every life changed for the good make the world that much better.
2. Regardless of where people live or what they believe, people should get the help they need.
3. I am a moral caring person.
4. I can.
5. I want my group; "Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious" or as I call it "the A-team", to continue to be the top team on Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from being a medical support clerk in the United States Air Force and live solely from my military pension and veteran disability compensation.

lender.name: Marguerita
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to have nothing.
lender.occupational_info: I write books, teach, make quilts and help other people.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
It's important to connect with people and make difference in any way that you can. All too often we get too self absorbed in our own world and our daily problems. People are important to me, even ones that I'll never meet.
Be the change you wish to see in the world -Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Nur
lender.loan_because: I feel satisfaction when I help others. I believe in humanity.
lender.occupational_info: Banking

lender.name: Kristoffer Bjärkefur
lender.loan_because: Just the feeling of knowing you co-funded a snuff-making shop in Afghanistan says it all... I do this only for extremely egoistic reasons. I think only of myself, therefore i lend...
lender.occupational_info: A social murder but intellectual stimulating...

lender.name: Pinggera
lender.loan_because: Enable fairness

lender.name: dizzyagain
lender.loan_because: Teach a man or a woman to fish....
lender.occupational_info: I create websites!

lender.name: Matteo e Anna
lender.loan_because: se li presto, quando me li rendono posso riprestarli... allora lo posso fare anche se sono tirchio!

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: giving is part of the ebb and flow of abundance. The more I give, the more I receive.
lender.occupational_info: Like a foreman on a construction job, a project manager has to bring all of the skilled people together necessary to get complex project completed.

lender.name: www.DiscGolfersR.us
lender.loan_because: Through our wonderful sport, we learn that every person - no matter their political or religious beliefs, or their socioeconomic status - can be a good disc golfing buddy. We'd like everyone in the world to join us.
lender.occupational_info: We are a club of people who play golf with flying discs.

lender.name: Damien
lender.loan_because: I see Kiva as a sustainable method of promoting industry and growth in communities disadvantaged because of geography. It recognises that reducing poverty is as much about creating balance by investing in real people and their own skills as it is about charity.

lender.name: Conan
lender.loan_because: 25 dollars goes a lot further in a developing country

lender.name: Erlend
lender.loan_because: I believe that every step into a positive direction counts!!
lender.occupational_info: When I'm finished working, there is electric light and heat in your house.

lender.name: Daniela
lender.loan_because: anyone in the world should have the chance to earn his living

lender.name: Callan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves developing cleaner and more efficient engines for use in transport and power generation.

lender.name: Tom and Judy
lender.loan_because: We are happy to help someone who needs help get started. We are paying it forward in thanks for those who helped us when we needed it. Thank you for this opportunity.

lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: I care about the future.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an economist, specializing in international trade.

lender.name: Clayton
lender.loan_because: I am aware that all that has been given to me, does not belong to me.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make a task easier and faster, without having to work harder.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of having a positive impact on someone who doesn't even know you, a world away. While Globalization has many detractors, one of its strengths is bringing people together in philanthropy. I am enthralled to be part of the process and I have to thank Nikolas Kristof from the NewYork Times for making me aware of this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a forensic pathologist. I perform autopsies to figure out why people die. I also counsel grieving families and explain to them what happened to their loved ones.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: We have more to share than we sometimes realize

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Someone once told me that if you can't save the whole at once, save it one person at a time, and the people you save can also make a difference. Kiva is that starting point for me.

lender.name: Debra
lender.occupational_info: I teach Organizational Behavior at a university and own a management consulting firm.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It's a great way of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies find good people.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: It's a nice way to help people across the earth from me better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I make films and help others make films at a filmschool.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: Jesus loves me. Jesus loves you.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I look to be part of a planet and community where we help one another in a spirit of trust, love, and a desire for riches for us all. I mean riches in terms of personal happiness and well-being for ourselves and our families; fulfilling lives with a sense of purpose; and inner peace and benevolent hearts.
lender.occupational_info: My work and my life are works in progress, as they are for all of us.

lender.name: katrina
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Adam and Cori
lender.loan_because: We can afford to.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: We are our brother's keeper. It is a way to give back and help others.
lender.occupational_info: Publisher of Christian and business digital inrformation

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I love to support people's dreams and empower them to excel
lender.occupational_info: I help groups to succeed with big goals that one person alone might not be able to accomplish.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to a better world, in small steps. I realize it is impossible to change it all at once.

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.occupational_info: I research and teach chemistry at a university.

lender.name: kathy
lender.occupational_info: I sell debt from one financial institution to another.

lender.name: Daniel and Mod
lender.occupation: Boredom interrupted by moments of pure horror.
lender.loan_because: Helping people makes us happy. As an atheist / Buddhist, we don't rely on make-believe god(s) to help our fellow man live a decent life.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.whereabouts: West Pennant Hills New South Wales

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a medical student. At the end of 2011 I will be a qualified doctor and will hopefully be able to be of some use to the world.

lender.name: Ali Trigg
lender.loan_because: It's so worthwhile. In this country we have so much and don't seem to appreciate it. By giving on Kiva, a little can make a big difference

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I believe it will help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach basic computer skills to college students.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference.However small.

lender.name: Derek Snow
lender.loan_because: " I Care "
lender.occupational_info: Challenging, yet extremely satisfying and rewarding.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can help others to achieve independence and confidence, just as I have been able to do thanks to the support of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am blessed with a wonderful family and friends. In my work I assist other businesses with the administration side of their work, like typing, filing, customer records etc.

lender.name: Jansen
lender.loan_because:
The best revenge in life is to live life well.
Success unshared is total failure.

lender.name: Howie
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.

lender.name: Mboh
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Leslie Steward
lender.loan_because: Golden Rule
lender.occupational_info: Computers

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: when I see someone in need I want to help. Empathy is an amazing trait and I'm glad I can treat others with kindness.

lender.name: Martijn
lender.occupation: Communication advisor District Court of Utrecht

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I load because I havn't many for start up my project in telecomminication area.
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to open the web site specially for one internet provader, where people may download different contents (video, muzik etc, just legal content). And users will pay from they pravicy account what they have when repay internet servise

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: Women need to give each other a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an auction house, but will be a student soon.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I love open source software because it's all about sharing and increasing knowledge. I commercially support companies and organizations with Joomla, an open source Content Management System to built websites.

lender.name: Livio
lender.loan_because: I love to help

lender.name: Frank C.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher in entrepreneurship University of Applied Sciences

lender.name: GUESSAN BI
lender.occupation: student of degree university of abidjan english d

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because:
For a very small amount we can help change lives!...
"We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from life."
Don't Forget The cemeteries are full of people who thought that the world could not get along without them!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, and now live in Spain...

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: To help provide money to those who can invest it
lender.occupational_info: I run small companies

lender.name: Jacquie
lender.loan_because: I want to help!

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I am Seeking to Understand the principles of investing.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an office tech, meaning that I catalog and organize software among other things.

lender.name: Vishal
lender.occupation: a bit of this and bit of that.
lender.loan_because: its an opportunity to be involved with people who are doing something constructive to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: jack of quite a few trades, in process of being master of a few (trades)...... :-)

lender.name: Carol&MillionthCircle
lender.loan_because: See the info on the team called: Millionth Circle 1

lender.name: Galvano Lopes
lender.loan_because: a small gesture can make a HUGE difference. Do something nice every day and we'll get a better world.
lender.occupational_info: We help people around the world to be in touch by working in the telecommunications bussiness.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have been supportive of the concept of micro-lending since I first heard of the Grameen Bank in the late 1980s. I am glad to have the chance to participate directly.
lender.occupational_info: I advise energy utility companies on ways to help their customers save energy.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to use their computers so they can be more successful at their work.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift card from someone special who thought I might enjoy this and I believe it's for a good cause.
lender.occupational_info: I serve food to people and clean up when they leave.

lender.name: Jabari
lender.loan_because: I know I don't need the money as much as these people do, and I know that helping them will help their economies grow in turn. Ultimately, I want to see the world grow richer and more prosperous as a result.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: To make the world a better place, by empowering individuals to reach their true potential through the gift of financial freedom.

lender.name: Bharat
lender.loan_because: My way of having a greater impact on poverty and economic development in underdeveloped countries.
lender.occupational_info: Use of Technology for economic development. Focus on agriculture value chains, retail and use of telecenters in rural areas.

lender.name: Joyce, Vince and Alex
lender.loan_because: We have been given opportunities in life that everyone should have a chance to have.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: we all need a little help now and again. It is very empowering to help a family, help itself
lender.occupational_info: My company brings Science To Life

lender.name: Adrianne
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an affordable and effective means of influencing change for the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a newspaper reporter in the U.S. I learn about things by reading and talking to people and then I write about it so that information flows freely.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because:
I think good ideas and hard work should be supported, no matter where a person lives.
Together, we can put predatory banks out of business just by reaching out to each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help lawyers create affordable housing in New York State.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: I can, and I think it makes life better for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: When an International Data Circuit goes down, I fix it.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I think it is great to be able to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I should, and I can. I give locally through the United Way, and I want to give globally as well. I believe we all need to focus on improving our world in whatever ways we can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Henkel, which produces many consumer and industrial products that people use every day. I manage a group that purchase services the business needs to operate.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I am a member of a global community and want to help however I can. I also want to set an example for my son that we all can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the entertainment business as an actor and director. Time between jobs lets me travel all over the world.

lender.name: Sue and Friends
lender.loan_because: I feel called to give assistance to those who struggle to make life better for their communities. God wants us to be part of the solution!
lender.occupational_info: We are Christians who love good stories. Sue is a storyteller and a singer. There is a story of hope that can be told. Our gifts enable those who have a plan and vision to create a better life for themselves and their families..

lender.name: EDC
lender.loan_because: We are a group of Christians that believe God is concerned with the Poor. We want to see our blessings passed on to bless others.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: There is quiet strength in small favors

lender.name: Abimbola
lender.loan_because: God gives to me and my family so that we can give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach HS mathematics. The most beautiful subject in the world.

lender.name: Ski to Sea
lender.loan_because: in Whatcom County, we not only ski, bike, run, kayak, and canoe but loan too!
lender.occupational_info: Donations collected by peacepennies from the 2009, 2010, and 2011 Ski to Sea Festivals are loaned (and reloaned) to women through Kiva. Keep checking back as we continue the lending process. Donations consist of funds raised from both the Small Change for Big Change Coin Drive and jewelry sales. Thanks Whatcom County for all the support and showing that just a few dollars, if used innovatively, can have an amazing impact!

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I have travelled widely and can see the benefits of such a scheme.
lender.occupational_info: Taking a year off!!

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have the ability
lender.occupational_info: I grew up on a farm and understand hard work and opportunity.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I think micro-credit is one way to improve lives. It's not enough by itself, but it is an interesting idea!
lender.occupational_info: I work in disaster management. I coordinate volunteers when there are emergencies like floods or forest fires.

lender.name: WAYNE "WOODY" M.
lender.loan_because: I HAVE BEEN BLESSED!!
lender.occupational_info: I HAVE AN ENTERTAINMENT SERVICES COMPANY IN CLEVELAND,OHIO U.S.A. THAT ENABLES ME TO WORK WITH ALL TYPES OF CREATIVE INDIVIDUALS DOING SOMETHING THAT I LOVE.

lender.name: cindy
lender.loan_because: I think when we help others, ultimately we help ourselves

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Gila
lender.loan_because: I love Helping people to fulfil their dreams come true
lender.occupational_info: my work also helps people to cosentraite with the things that they wish and I design their home to achieve their Goals

lender.name: Pádraig
lender.loan_because: I believe people doing small things can make big changes.
lender.occupational_info: I co-ordinate conversations between groups of adults discussing religious, social, economic and moral difference.

lender.name: Darryl Luscombe
lender.loan_because: I can afford it.
lender.occupational_info: I analyse companies to determine whether they are contributing to the greater good or are part of the problem.

lender.name: Lubomir
lender.loan_because: How many times have complete strangers helped me? Countless. This is the least I can do to repay the generosity of those that have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Masters Candidate in Latin American Studies and International Economics

lender.name: Pieter
lender.occupation: Director University of Applied Sciences Utrecht

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers make use of technology in their classrooms.

lender.name: INTER-ACCION.org
lender.occupation: NGO - International mobility and Lifelong Learning
lender.loan_because: We believe that this is the best way to empower people and give them opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: NGO working with the European Union Youth in Action Programme to promote youth participation, international mobility and to facilitate the inclusion of young people with fewer opportunities.

lender.name: Suchitra
lender.loan_because: I'd like to spread a little bit more love!
lender.occupational_info: One day, I hope to make a difference. And I hope that every day is that day.

lender.name: Ambreen
lender.loan_because: In God's eyes we're all the same, someday we'll all have perfect wings.
lender.occupational_info: A citizen of the World.

lender.name: HA-Seeb
lender.loan_because: per my faith, it is a duty to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I design cellphone networks

lender.name: mauricio
lender.loan_because: Please help small entrepreneurs in PERU!!
lender.occupational_info: Small entrepreneurs need help to grow and support their families. I was born in Peru and would like that more people help entrepreneurs raise their families out of poverty!

lender.name: Torsten Tromm
lender.occupational_info: I´m CEO of a Online Marketing company. We help other companies to sell goods and services on the internet.

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: I like the idea behind KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: Manage the software development department in an international biotechnology company.

lender.name: Maike
lender.loan_because: It is important to support eachother. If I am able to help somebody with lending a little amount of money - i should devinitely do it.

lender.name: Dimitar & Daniela
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: Writing computer programs in a bank.

lender.name: Isabel
lender.occupation: Mother / teacher to my children / N.A.-Kids Club

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Mats
lender.loan_because: I like lending for a direct cause, to a person I know need them and will put the money to work and create a better life for herself and her family.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur with my bases in the computer software and internet service industry. I started my first company aged 16 and are still at it....

lender.name: Rasmus
lender.loan_because: I love to see peopel taking own initiatives and hate to see good ideas go to waste because a lak of money.
lender.occupational_info: I study medicine - a lot of hard work, and a lot of fun!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe that by supporting others around the world, we foster better relationships. Hopefully this leads to a more peaceful future.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur in a business that teaches fermentation of food and beverages including, wine, cheese, beer, vinegar and mead.

lender.name: Lisa Risager
lender.loan_because: I would like all women to be able to support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in my home and I use a computer. I make websites and I enjoy doing it.
I am 49 years old, I am married and I have a son and a daughter.
Also I like to make things with wool - spinning, weaving, knitting, crocheting - I like to make clothes.

lender.name: Jolyn
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to give back given how blessed my life has been!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: lending relatively small loan amounts combined with other lenders result in remarkable loans.
lender.occupational_info: I loan money to people who own real estate that are having a hard time getting it elsewhere.

lender.name: Franziska
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Leigh
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers and students learn about the world around them.

lender.name: E.C.
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physics student and alumna of the Teach For America Mississippi Delta corps.

lender.name: Clayton
lender.loan_because: Someone took the time to invest in me and that's how I got started in internet marketing. I feel like I need to pass that blessing on and invest in others. By us doing this we are giving people the opportunity to change their entire family tree.

lender.name: Klein Eden
lender.occupational_info: We make and sell soup to friends and family. Part of what we earn is donated to Kiva.

lender.name: Rune
lender.loan_because: Because I can

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor at a small local university.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I try to practice what I preach.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor of a small congregation of the United Church of Christ in southeastern New York.

lender.name: Larry & Roxanna
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the idea of helping others - help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with elementary students that have learning and/or physical disabilities. As in my life's work, it is my goal to get my students with special needs to learn, prosper, and improve their standard of living. So that they to may some day realize the joy helping themselves and helping others.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: trying to help the community by building the momentum to eradicate poverty. Raise awareness of non-profits with creative and effective business models like Kiva.

lender.name: Danny & Kate
lender.loan_because: We want to give a chance to hardworking people who deserve it.
lender.occupational_info: We teach in a remote inuit community (Salluit) in the great north.

lender.name: Paul Hornick
lender.loan_because: For years, I've lobbied Congress to fund microlending as part of foreign aid. I've decided to put some of my own money into it, too.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired and on SS disability, so I do only volunteer work.

lender.name: Michael J. Dijak
lender.loan_because: I loan because it allows me to make a difference in someone's life, even if he or she may be half way across the world. I am primarily a student but I am also a Field Sales Manager with Vector Marketing Corporation. As an entrepreneur myself, I understand how money can be tight, especially since my business isn't my primary venture. I can only imagine the hardship these individuals experience and being able to help them even a little is worth every penny.
lender.occupational_info: I currently attend Truman State University in Kirksville, MO. I am studying Political Science & Communication. I run my own business within Vector Marketing Corporation as well; this past summer (2010) I initiated, directed and executed the opening of my own sales and recruiting office in Des Moines, IA.

lender.name: Maarten
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: Designing the way computer programs look and behavebehaviour.

lender.loan_because: I know how little it takes to improve lives, I love maps and travel, and Kiva is a way to combine compassion with my habitual curiosity about other places and other cultures.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art appreciation, studio art, and also work with nonprofit organizations (NGOs).
